# SWAttributionView.DisplayContext.summary

**Case**

Indicates that the system is offering the attributed content shown along with this view to the user for consumption.

## Declaration

```swift
case summary
```

## Discussion

The is the default value for [doc://com.apple.sharedwithyou/documentation/SharedWithYou/SWAttributionView/displayContext-swift.property].

## Context styles

- **SWAttributionView.DisplayContext.detail**: Indicates that the attributed content shown along with this view is being actively consumed by the user.
